roleset.name: appeal, be attractive, indulging, placating
roleset.note: PANDER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pander' based on sentences in ECTB.Based on 'appeal' of Verbnet appeal-31.4. (from pander.01-v predicate notes)
PANDERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, pander.01. No VNcls. (from pandering.01-n)

example.name: find attractive
example.text: But we are professionals, and, rather than * pandering to the audience, we should ...

example.name: both args
example.text: My point is that his pandering to the crowd was brutal
